about_the_game:
Do you want to create your dream Kitchen? With the Kitchen DLC it's now possible. You can create any kitchenyou want. Any size, any color combination, any budget, separate or combined with a living room - it's all up to you.

Try all 80 new items and create your dream Kitchen. Why not make a kitchen gaming setup? Combine DLC furniture with default one to achive best looking room and let your imagination run wild.


Give your room a special touch with new items and turn it into a dream environment.

The Kitchen DLC contains:

  • 80 new items.
  • 2 full sets of kitchen furniture.
  • Cutlery, crockery, food, decor items and more.
